name: Desperate Battler
text: Your experiences fighting against numerous foes that have already overwhelmed your allies, friends, and family have forced you to excel at fighting on your own.
benefit: When no ally is within 10 feet of you and you are not receiving benefits from the aid another action, you gain a +1 morale bonus on melee attack and damage rolls.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to gain the benefits of Desperate Battler even while an ally is within 10 feet of you (but not when receiving the benefits of the aid another action).
text_zh: 你亲身对抗众多敌人。这些敌人已经击垮了你的盟友、同伴以及家人，这迫使你精于独自战斗。
benefit_zh: 当你身边10尺范围之内没有任何盟友，并且你没有获得来自援助他人动作的优势时，你的近战攻击与伤害检定获得+1士气加值。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来获得亡命斗士的好处，即使你的盟友在你10尺之内（但获得援助他人的增益时并不会获得这个好处）。
